thread.title: Excellent hotel !
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel ! - Review of Residence Inn New York Downtown Manhattan/World Trade Center Area, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lizyserr
title: Excellent hotel !
text:
We stayed in this hotel in a suite.Room 404. It is big, very accesible and beautiful. The suite was very clean and we have all we need. The free breakfasts are the most completes I've seen. Fulton St subway station very closed.
Definitively will recommend it to friends and family.
